sn55.44:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako ‘addho mahaddhano mahabhogo’ti vuccati.
sn55.44:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.44:2.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati;
sn55.44:2.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.44:2.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako ‘addho mahaddhano mahabhogo’ti vuccati”ti.
